verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>When<s%> he <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4602>silence<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> for <S%G5613>about<s%> half an <S%G2256>hour.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3031>censer.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G2368>incense<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G1325>add<s%> it to the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> which <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G2368>incense,<s%> with the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%>'s <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G3031>censer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> with the <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>threw<s%> it <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> There <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G1027>thunders,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5456>sounds,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G796>lightnings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G32><s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G3396>mixed<s%> with <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> One third of the earth was burnt <S%G5154>up,<s%> and one third of the <S%G1186>trees<s%> were burnt <S%G2618>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> was burnt <S%G2618>up.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>something<s%> like a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G4442><s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> was <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G2192>the<s%> <S%G2192>living<s%> <S%G2938>creatures<s%> which <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4143>ships<s%> were <S%G1311>destroyed.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2985>torch,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4215>rivers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4077>springs<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G792>star<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G894>"Wormwood.<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G894>wormwood.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5204>waters,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they were made <S%G4087>bitter.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G4141>struck,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4582>moon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G792>stars;<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> would be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3361>wouldn't<s%> <S%G5316>shine<s%> for one <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> in the same <S%G3668>way.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1520>an<s%> <S%G32>eagle,<s%> <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> mid <S%G3321>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3759>"Woe!<s%> <S%G3759>Woe!<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> for those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4536>trumpets<s%> of the <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G3195>yet<s%> to <S%G4537>sound!<s%>"
